item.title: Risk-Sharing Tests and Covariate Shocks: Drought, Floods, and Pests in Uganda
item.description: Devises new methods to compute households' marginal utilities of expenditure based on nonhomothetic preferences. This allows us to test efficient risk-sharing even when shocks are covariate.
